snippet: Mitt Romney says, referring to his chief rival, Rick Santorum, “Newt Gingrich won his state; I won my state. I think people expect the senator to win his home state.”
abstract: Mitt Romney says, referring to his chief rival, Rick Santorum, “Newt Gingrich won his state; I won my state. I think people expect the senator to win his home state.”

headline.main: Romney Says Santorum Should Win His Home State
